synopsis.text:
One high school student, Masamune Izumi, has a secret life as a light novel author, partnering with an anonymous illustrator known for creating provocative images under the pseudonym "Eromanga-sensei." Balancing school, writing, and caring for his reclusive younger sister, Sagiri, proves challenging, as she refuses to leave her room or interact with society. When Masamune discovers that Sagiri is, in fact, his elusive illustrator, their sibling dynamics take a chaotic turn.

As they navigate their newfound partnership, the duo faces challenges in the competitive light novel industry, including rival authors attempting to poach Eromanga-sensei. With their unique bond and shared passion for storytelling, Masamune and Sagiri strive for success while learning to understand each other better. As Sagiri begins to open up, she must decide how long she can conceal her true identity from the world. Join this unconventional pair as they embark on a journey filled with laughter, love, and the occasional lewd illustration.
